attributes.contentHtml: Bartosz1 i do agree that this was a dumb descision and i hate dm advertrisers too but i didnt hire him, again it was farakiu and i do agree that he dosent deserve the co owner role as he didnt do anything what i mean by "anything" is he didnt invest, of course if he dosent wanna invest he could have send links to farakiu, i understand that he didnt wanna help us with this host and i know the reason its bc he owned a host back then and he was taking care of his host, again we have nothing to do with it this was farakiu.
